api.body:
require "pixcHelper"
require "pixcNetwork"
if self.lock == true then return end
self.lock = true
if self.helper ~= nil then
	self.uninit();
	Utils.Timer.sleep(500)
end
self.lock = nil
self.helper = createPixcHelper(pixc,self())
self.network = createPixcNetwork()
self.connected = false
--pixc.log(self.helper)
--pixc.log(self.network)
self.IsConnected(false, true)
self.ip = self.helper:getProperty("IP","127.0.0.1")
self.port = tonumber(self.helper:getProperty("Port","6451"))
self.ipLocal =pixc.getRoot().Utils.Network.convertLocalAdapterEntry(self.helper:getProperty("Adapter IP","0.0.0.0"))
local ready = false
self.network:configureTcp(
	self.ip,
	self.port,
	function (handle, data) self().receive(data) end,
	function(handle, error)
        pixc.log("closeCallback: "..error)
        ready = true
    end,
	self.ipLocal)
self.network:setStatusCallbacks(
	function (...)  end,
	function(isConnected)
        self().IsConnected(isConnected, true)
        ready = true
		if self.connected == "true" or self.connected == true then
			self.send("#\r")
			self.send("#VERSION?\r")
			self.send("#SN?\r")
			self.send("#MODEL? \r")
			self.send("#NAME? \r")
			self.send("#NET-DHCP? \r")
			self.send("#NET-GATE? \r")
			self.send("#NET-IP? \r")
			self.send("#NET-MAC? \r")
			self.send("#NET-MASK? \r")
			self.send("#PROT-VER? \r")
			self.send("#INFO-IO? \r")
			self.send("#BUILD-DATE? \r")
			self.send("#BAUD? \r")

			if self.interval ~= nil then
				pixc.getRoot().Utils.Timer.clearInterval(self.interval)
				self.interval = nil
			end
			self.interval = pixc.getRoot().Utils.Timer.setInterval(
				function()
					for i=1,8,1 do			
						--input info
							self.send("#SIGNAL? " .. i .. "\r")
						--output info
							self.send("#VID? " .. i .. "\r")
						--testpattern
							self.send("#VID-PATTERN? " .. i .. "\r")
						--mute
							self.send("#VMUTE? " .. i .. "\r")
						end
						--self.send("#REMOTE-INFO? 0,1\r")
				end, 4000)

			
		end
    end)
self.network:start()

if blocking then
    while not ready do
        Utils.Timer.sleep(100)
    end
end
api.name: init

api.body:
if self.network ~= nil then 
	self.network:close()
	self.network = nil
end
if self.interval ~= nil then
	pixc.getRoot().Utils.Timer.clearInterval(self.interval)
	self.interval = nil
end
self.helper = nil
api.name: uninit

api.body:
if self.connected == false or self.connected == "false" or self.connected == nil then
	return
end
self.network:send(msg)
api.name: send

api.body:
--pixc.log("got data")
--self.send("Echo: "..msg)
msg = string.gsub(msg,"\n","")

local msgs = self.helper.stringSplit(msg,"\r")

for i,n in pairs(msgs) do
	local _msgTable = self.helper.stringSplit(n,"@")
	local _messageType = self.helper.stringSplit(_msgTable[2]," ")

	if _msgTable[2] ~= nil then
		if not string.match(_msgTable[2],"ERR") then
			if _messageType[1] == "VERSION" then
				self.System.version(_messageType[2],true)
			elseif _messageType[1] == "SN" then
				self.System.serialNumber(_messageType[2],true)
			elseif _messageType[1] == "RESET" then
				pixc.log(self() .. " Reset Ok")
			elseif _messageType[1] == "REMOTE-INFO" then
				local _info = self.helper.stringSplit(_messageType[2],",")
				for i,n in pairs(_info) do
					pixc.log(i,n)
				end
			elseif _messageType[1] == "PROT-VER" then
				self.System.protocolVersion(_messageType[2],true)
			elseif _messageType[1] == "NET-MASK" then
				self.System.subnet(_messageType[2],true)
			elseif _messageType[1] == "NET-MAC" then
				self.System.macAddress(_messageType[2],true)
			elseif _messageType[1] == "NET-IP" then
				self.System.ipAddress(_messageType[2],true)
			elseif _messageType[1] == "NET-GATE" then
				self.System.gateway(_messageType[2],true)
			elseif _messageType[1] == "NET-DHCP" then
				if _messageType[2] == "0" then
					self.System.dhcp(false,true)
				else
					self.System.dhcp(true,true)
				end
			elseif _messageType[1] == "NAME" then
				self.System.name(_messageType[2],true)
			elseif _messageType[1] == "MODEL" then
				self.System.model(_messageType[2],true)
			elseif _messageType[1] == "INFO-IO" and _messageType[3] ~= nil then
				local _inTable = self.helper.stringSplit(_messageType[3],",")
				self.System.numberInputs(tonumber(_inTable[1]),true)
				self.System.numberOutputs(tonumber(_messageType[4]),true)
			elseif _messageType[1] == "ETH-PORT" then
				self.System.ethPortProtocol(_messageType[2],true)
			elseif _messageType[1] == "BUILD-DATE" and _messageType[3] ~= nil then
				self.System.buildDate(_messageType[2] .. " - " .. _messageType[3],true)
			elseif _messageType[1] == "BAUD" then
				self.System.serialBaudrate(_messageType[2],true)
			elseif _messageType[1] == "SIGNAL" then
				local _info = self.helper.stringSplit(_messageType[2],",")
				if _info[1] ~= nil and _info[2] ~= nil then
					if self.ioStatus["Input" .. _info[1]] ~= nil and _info[1] ~= nil then
						local state = "No Signal"
						if _info[2] == "1" then state = "Input Present" end
						if self["_i" .. _info[1] .. "signalStatus"] ~= state then
							self.ioStatus["Input" .. _info[1]].signalStatus(state,true)
						end
					end
				end
			elseif _messageType[1] == "VID" then
				local _info = self.helper.stringSplit(_messageType[2],">")
				if _info[1] ~= nil and _info[2] ~= nil then
					if self.ioStatus["Output" .. _info[2]] ~= nil then
						if self["_o" .. _info[2] .. "inputState"] ~= _info[1] then
							self.ioStatus["Output" .. _info[2]].input(_info[1],true)
						end
					end
				end
			elseif _messageType[1] == "VID-PATTERN" then
				local _info = self.helper.stringSplit(_messageType[2],",")
				if _info[1] ~= nil and _info[2] ~= nil then
					if self.ioStatus["Output" .. _info[1]] ~= nil then
						if self["_o" .. _info[1] .. "testpattern"] ~= _info[2] then
							self.ioStatus["Output" .. _info[1]].testpattern(_info[2],true)
						end
					end
				end
			elseif _messageType[1] == "VMUTE" then
				local _info = self.helper.stringSplit(_messageType[2],",")
				if _info[1] ~= nil and _info[2] ~= nil then
					if self.ioStatus["Output" .. _info[1]] ~= nil  then
						local state = "true"
						if _info[2] == "1" then
							state = "false"
						elseif _info[2] == "2" then
							state = "blank picture"
						end
						if self["_o" .. _info[1] .. "mute"] ~= state then
							self.ioStatus["Output" .. _info[1]].mute(state,true)
						end
					end
				end
			elseif _messageType[1] == "PRST-LST" then
				pixc.log(_messageType[2])
			end
		else
			
			local _type = string.sub(_messageType[1],1,3)
			local _code = tonumber(string.sub(_messageType[1],4,7))
			local errorMessages = {
					"Protocol syntax",
					"Command not available",
					"Parameter out of range",
					"Unauthorized access",
					"Internal FW error",
					"Protocol busy",
					"Wrong CRC",
					"Timeout",
					"(Reserved)",
					"Not enough space for data (firmware, FPGA…)",
					"Not enough space – file system",
					"File does not exist",
					"File can’t be created",
					"File can’t open",
					"Feature is not supported",
					"(Reserved)",
					"(Reserved)",
					"(Reserved)",
					"(Reserved)",
					"(Reserved)",
					"Packet CRC error",
					"Packet number isn't expected (missing packet)",
					"Packet size is wrong",
					"(Reserved)",
					"(Reserved)",
					"(Reserved)",
					"(Reserved)",
					"(Reserved)",
					"(Reserved)",
					"EDID corrupted",
					"Device specific errors",
					"File has the same CRC – not changed",
					"Wrong operation mode",
					"Device/chip was not initialized"
				}
			if _type == "ERR" then --error handler
				local _type = string.sub(_messageType[1],1,3)
				local _code = tonumber(string.sub(_messageType[1],4,7))
				if _code > 0 and errorMessages[_code] ~= nil then
					pixc.warning(self() .. " " .. errorMessages[_code])
				end
			else
				local _type = string.sub(_messageType[2],1,3)
				local _code = tonumber(string.sub(_messageType[2],4,7))
				if _code > 0 and errorMessages[_code] ~= nil then
					pixc.error(self() .. " received error on msg command. ", _messageType[1],errorMessages[_code] )
				end
			end
		end
	end
end
api.name: receive

api.body:
self.connected = pixcCommon.execAttribute(false, self.connected, isConnected, doSet)
if isConnected == true or isConnected == "true" then

end
api.name: IsConnected

elems.body:
if input == nil or output == nil then
	pixc.error(self() .. " Input or Output was nil.", input, output)
	return
end
local i = math.floor(math.abs(tonumber(input)))
local o = math.floor(math.abs(tonumber(output)))
self.send("#VID " .. o .. ">" .. i .. "\r")
elems.name: InToOut

elems.body:
if testpattern == nil or output == nil then
	pixc.error(self() .. " Input or Output was nil.", testpattern, output)
	return
end
local i = math.floor(math.abs(tonumber(testpattern)))
local o = math.floor(math.abs(tonumber(output)))
self.send("#VID-PATTERN " .. o .. ">" .. i .. "\r")
elems.name: TestpatternToOut

elems.body:
if flag == nil or output == nil then
	pixc.error(self() .. " Input or Output was nil.", flag, output)
	return
end
local f = math.floor(math.abs(tonumber(flag)))
local o = math.floor(math.abs(tonumber(output)))
self.send("#VMUTE " .. o .. ">" .. f .. "\r")
elems.documentation:
flag:
0 = Video enabled
1 = Video disabled2 = Blank picture
elems.name: MuteOut

	pixc.error(self() .. " Input or Output was nil.", id)
	return
end

self.send("#PRST-RCL " .. i .. "\r")
